::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod sees the missile.
"Hot Rod, MAXIMIZE!" He transformes to bot mode, jumping over the
missile. But the plasma blasts strike his back, sending him rolling on
the ground. Hot Rod is quikly back to his feet.
"Now I'm MAD!" He says, shooting off two rockets, two optic blasts, and
six plama blasts at the attackers.
